article: An old woman having lost the use of her eyes visited a doctor to heal them. She made this _ with him in the presence of witness that if he could _ her blindness, he should receive a sum of money from her, but if her disease _ , she should give him _ . After the agreement was made, the doctor, time after time, _ some of his medicine on her eyes, and on every _ took something away, _ all her property little by little. And when he had got all she had, he healed her and _ the promised payment. The old woman, when she _ her sight and saw _ of her goods in her house, would give him nothing. The doctor insisted on his payment and as she still refused he finally decided to go to the court and reported his case before the _ . The old woman, standing up in the court, _ , "This man here speaks the _ in what he says, for I did _ to give him a sum of money if I could recover my sight, but if I continued to be blind, I was to give him nothing. Now he says that I am healed. I, on the contrary , think that I am still blind, _ when I lost the use of my eyes, I saw in my house a lot of property and _ goods, but now, though he _ that I am cured of my blindness, I am not able to see a(an) _ thing in it."
